constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 49 (Tuesday, March 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BOWMAN:
H.R. 1904.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18.
[Page H1413]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Broadband Justice Act of 2021
